name: Summer House Sydney City
description:
Welcome to Summer House Sydney City (formerly Sydney Backpackers)

Experience Sydney like never before at Summer House Sydney City, your newly renovated urban retreat in the heart of the CBD. Part of the renowned Summer House brand with hostels along Australia’s East Coast, our property offers modern comfort, unbeatable location, and a vibrant community.

Central location:
Situated in the heart of Sydney’s CBD, we’re just 20 minutes from the airport by public transport or car. Famous landmarks like Circular Quay, the Opera House, and the Harbour Bridge are within a 15-minute walk. Steps from George Street, you’ll find shops, cafes, restaurants, banks, currency exchange, and more right at your doorstep.

Features & Facilities:
Whether you're here to explore or unwind, we've got you covered:

A stunning rooftop terrace to relax and soak in city views.
A cozy TV room with Netflix for those chill nights.
A fully equipped kitchen and dining areas for home-cooked meals.
Modern, spacious rooms featuring curtained beds, under-bed storage lockers, and premium mattresses.
Stylish and modern bathrooms and showers.
On-site guest laundry facilities for convenience.

Community Vibes & Daily Events
Join our free daily events, including the ever-popular Friday BBQ and Sunday morning pancakes, designed to bring travelers together. Our travel desk is here to help you plan unforgettable tours and excursions.

Additional Perks

Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the property
Free Sim Cards on arrival
Free Coffee & Tea all day
Reception open 8 AM – 8 PM daily, with a night manager on duty for late check-ins (until 2 AM).
Secure access for your peace of mind.

Check-In & Check-Out

Check-in: From 2 PM
Check-out: By 10 AM

Booking & Payment Policies
Non-refundable bookings: Full payment will be charged before arrival to secure your reservation.
Pay-on-arrival bookings: A charge for the first night will be processed 24 hours prior to arrival, with the balance payable at check-in.
Payments accepted via Visa, MasterCard, or cash (AMEX not accepted). Card transactions incur a 1.9% surcharge.
A valid passport or driver's license is required at check-in; failure to provide one may result in cancellation of your booking.
A $20 key deposit is collected at check-in and refunded upon return.
Guests must be 18+ years old to stay.

Cancellation Policies
Cancellations made within 24 hours of arrival or no-shows will result in a charge equivalent to one night’s stay per person.
Changes to bookings must be requested at least 24 hours before check-in and are subject to availability.
Reservations during peak periods, such as December 30th, 31st, and January 1st, require a minimum 3-night stay and are non-refundable.

Whether you’re here to explore Sydney’s iconic sights, meet fellow travelers, or relax in style, Summer House Sydney City offers the perfect base for your adventure. Book your stay today and discover why we’re a favorite for travelers seeking the best of Sydney.

houseRules.notes:
*Check in: 2PM
*Check out: 10AM

PLEASE NOTE: 
Only accept guests over 18 years -35 years old presenting a valid foreign passport
* $20 Key deposit upon checking in
* 1.9% surcharge on all card payments (No Amex accepted)

*NO OUTSIDE GUESTS

 **Please note that all bookings have a 3-night minimum stay during the dates of December 30th, 31st, and January 1st, and bookings during this period are non-refundable**

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
